Articles.Content:
I'm getting close to needing to setup some tankers and haulers on a large-scale. Instead of just using the large cylindrical tanks, I'd like something more industrial looking, like a space mining ship or space tanker might look like. Any other Eve Online players will know what I mean.

I used to use THSS tanks but it no longer exists and the old part files won't load in 1.x but I want something like that:

Can't seem to find anything similar other than HexCans but I'm not a fan of the cartoonish logos on them, and even the largest ones are too small for what I want to haul.
LackLusterLabs has a lot of interesting blocky parts, but Im not sure If youd like them as theyre not exactly grid with tank style.

I've not used it personally, but one of RoverDude's mods adds 5 m containers for all sorts of materials. I personally like how some are modeled after Star Wars parts, like the 'blockade runner' hammerhead styled command pod and containers shaped like the ones from the old X-Wing series of flight sims.
Since this appears to be a request for add-on content, I'll be moving it to our General Add-on Affairs forum. Carry on

Try SPEEDY'S HexTruss, heavily inspired by THSS

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I've not used it personally, but one of RoverDude's mods adds 5 m containers for all sorts of materials. I personally like how some are modeled after Star Wars parts, like the 'blockade runner' hammerhead styled command pod and containers shaped like the ones from the old X-Wing series of flight sims.
Pssst. Its modeled after 2001: A Space Odessey. I am 97.354% sure

I've not used it personally, but one of RoverDude's mods adds 5 m containers for all sorts of materials. I personally like how some are modeled after Star Wars parts, like the 'blockade runner' hammerhead styled command pod and containers shaped like the ones from the old X-Wing series of flight sims.

Freight Transport Technologies has the "Honeybadger" and "Starlifter" parts. The Starlifter parts are real close to what OP wants.
I'm pretty sure B9 Aerospace's HX parts may be what you're looking for.

Cool thanks all. I think the Starlifter parts are what I'm after. I actually used those parts long ago but completely forgot about them! LOL I'm going to sift through the config files to see if I can make them haul Extraplanetary Launchpad resources like Metal-Ore, metal, scrap metal and rocket parts. Starlifter tanks can already switch to different resources so I just have to see if I can add my own.

Thanks again all! Now to start building my monster hauler...
FYI, I believe RoverDude has indicated that the tanks in FTT will be deprecated. To be safe, you should probably use the "Kontainer" parts from the latest versions of MKS/OKS.
Darn. Ok blender, time to make some massive ugly tanks lol
